customize.title: Customize your wallet
customize.description: Wallet names are stored locally on your device.

error.name: Wallet name must be at least 4 characters.

seedPhrase.title: Write Down Your Seed Phrase
seedPhrase.description: This is your seed phrase. Write it down on paper and keep it in a safe place. You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.

confirmSeedPhrase.title: Confirm Seed Phrase
confirmSeedPhrase.description: Select each word in the order it was presented to you

mask.title: Tap to reveal your seed phrase
mask.description: Make sure no one is watching your screen.

success.title: Congratulations

primaryDescription.2: Remember to keep your seed phrase safe, it's your responsibility!

success.secondaryDescription: Gasless Wallet cannot recover your wallet if you lose it.

exists.title: Existing Wallet
exists.description: Import wallet with a 12 secret recovery words

error.waitForFeeToLoad: Wait for the fee to load.
error.addressNotExist: Invalid TRC20 address: Address doesn't exist on the TRON network.
error.youMustEnterAtLeast: You must enter at least {{value}} token to send.
error.amountMustBePositive: Amount must be a positive number.

alert.title: Transaction Failed with Optimized Fee
alert.description: We couldn’t process your transaction with the optimized fee. Would you like to try again with the standard fee?

error.insufficientTRXBalance: Not enough TRX to cover fees.
error.default: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

token.title: Only USDT Transfers Supported
token.description: This batch only supports USDT transfers. Please use USDT for all entries.

max.label: Maximum number of transactions allowed (temporary limit)

policy.title: Fee Policy
policy.description: We temporarily lock the maximum fee per transaction. After completion, unused fees are automatically refunded.

1.text: Add one transaction per line using the format:

2.text: Each line represents a TRC20 USDT transfer. Example:

rules.title: Formatting Rules
rules.2: Separate address and amount with a single space

idle.title: Getting Ready
idle.description: Preparing to initialize the batch process.

pending.title: Initializing Batch
pending.description: The batch process is starting up. Please hold on a moment.

error.title: Initialization Failed
error.description: Could not start the batch process.

pending.title: Calculating Fees
pending.description: Analyzing the cost of the transactions. Please wait...

error.title: Fee Calculation Error
error.description: We couldn't calculate the required fees.

success.title: Fees Calculated
success.description: All fees have been calculated successfully.

idle.title: Waiting for Preparation
idle.description: Awaiting the preparation of your batch transactions.

pending.title: Preparing Transactions
pending.description: Creating and organizing all transactions in the batch.

error.title: Transaction Preparation Failed
error.description: We couldn't prepare the batch transactions.

success.title: Transactions Prepared
success.description: All transactions have been prepared and are ready to be sent.

idle.title: Waiting for Fee Setup
idle.description: Awaiting the preparation of fee transactions.

pending.title: Preparing Fee Transactions
pending.description: Setting up internal transactions to cover fees.

error.title: Fee Transaction Preparation Failed
error.description: We couldn't prepare fee-related transactions. Please try again.

success.title: Fee Transactions Ready
success.description: All fee transactions have been prepared successfully.

idle.title: Waiting to Send
idle.description: Awaiting confirmation to send the transactions.

pending.title: Sending Transactions
pending.description: Broadcasting your transactions to the server.

error.title: Transaction Sending Failed
error.description: There was an issue sending the transactions. Please try again.

success.title: Transactions Sent
success.description: All transactions have been successfully sent to the server.

idle.title: Awaiting Cashback
idle.description: Waiting to process cashback or post-transaction rewards.

pending.title: Processing Cashback
pending.description: Applying any applicable cashback or post-transaction benefits.

error.title: Cashback Failed
error.description: There was a problem processing your cashback.

success.title: Cashback Applied
success.description: Your cashback or rewards have been successfully processed.

succeeded.title: Batch Successfully Processed
succeeded.description: All transactions have been validated and sent to the server.

failed.title: Batch Process Failed
failed.description: The batch process encountered an unrecoverable error. Please check the details and try again if applicable.

cancelled.title: Batch Cancelled
cancelled.description: You cancelled the batch transaction process before completion.

interrupted.title: Batch Interrupted
interrupted.description: The batch process was interrupted unexpectedly. Some transactions may not have completed.

error.youMustEnterAtLeast: You must enter at least {{value}} token to send.
error.amountMustBePositive: Amount must be a positive number.

progress.title: Wait - Processing
progress.description: Your transaction is being processed. Please wait a moment.

referral.link: Get 10% of your friends transaction fees

modal.title: Sign out of All Wallets?
modal.description: This will erase keys to all wallets. Make sure you have backed up your recovery phrases.

first.title: Welcome to Gasless Wallet!
first.description: 💼 Your decentralized wallet on Tron. Convenient, secure, and cost-effective transactions in your.

second.title: Gas Optimization
second.description: ⚡️ Save up to 50% on fees! With our innovations, you can make transactions with minimal gas costs.

third.title: Buy TRX without gas
third.description: 💸 Top up your TRX balance even if you have no TRX! Purchase TRX with USDT, even when you have no TRX in your account.

fourth.title: Earn with the referral program
fourth.description: 🤝 Get 10% from your friends' transaction fees! Invite friends to Gasless Wallet and earn on their transactions.

fifth.title: Fast and Easy
fifth.description: 🚀 Make transactions in just a few clicks! A simple and intuitive interface for maximum convenience.

mask.title: Tap to reveal content
mask.description: Make sure no one is watching your screen.
